snippet: The Food and Drug Administration said that smokers who are trying to quit can safely use over-the counter nicotine gum, patches and lozenges for longer than previously recommended.
abstract: Food and Drug Administration says smokers who are trying to quit can safely use over-the-counter nicotine gum, patches and lozenges for longer than previously recommended.
lead_paragraph: The Food and Drug Administration said that smokers who are trying to quit can safely use over-the counter nicotine gum, patches and lozenges for longer than previously recommended.

headline.seo: Longer Use Approved for Nicotine Replacements
headline.main: Longer Use Approved for Nicotine Replacements
headline.print_headline: Longer Use Approved For Nicotine Replacements
